title: Signed oak bow

properties.name: description
properties.value: The signed oak bow is obtained during the Ghosts Ahoy quest. It is identical to an oak longbow but has been signed by Robin in Port Phasmatys after the player beats him in several games of Rune-Draw. Ak-Haranu has the translation manual which the player requires, and requests the signed oak bow in exchange for it.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Signed oak shieldbow
Signed oak bow

ExamineThis bow has been signed by Robin, Master Bowman.

Advanced data
Item ID4236

The signed oak bow is obtained during the Ghosts Ahoy quest. It is identical to an oak longbow but has been signed by Robin in Port Phasmatys after the player beats him in several games of Rune-Draw. Ak-Haranu has the translation manual which the player requires, and requests the signed oak bow in exchange for it.

It is possible to obtain multiple signed oak bows through use of the drop trick, however, players are no longer able to request a signed oak bow from Robin after returning the bow to Ak-Haranu. Additionally, upon completing the quest, any duplicates will NOT be lost.

6 June 2019
(update)

The inventory icon has been given a graphical update to differentiate it from the oak longbow.

7 August -
30 October 2006

The item was renamed from "Oak longbow" to "Signed oak bow".

It is identical to an [[oak longbow]] but has been signed by [[Robin]] in [[Port Phasmatys]] after the player beats him in several games of [[Rune-Draw]]. [[Ak-Haranu]] has the [[translation manual]] which the player requires, and requests the signed oak bow in exchange for it. It is possible to obtain multiple signed oak bows through use of the [[drop trick]], however, players are no longer able to request a signed oak bow from Robin after returning the bow to Ak-Haranu.
